name: FF3: Style the "Highlight all" results (Ctrl+F)
description:
This version of my style style 153 is only for Firefox 3.

it styles the "Highlight all" results when searching with the search bar (Ctrl+F).

Change the colors to your liking.

discussions.name:
Does not work on v3.0.1 on Windows XP.

Great co
Works on 3.0.3, though I suspect it worked on 3.0.
